# 2022년 12월 30일
## 알파벳 트리 장난감 ★2
  
### 문제

![](./img/qimg.png)

--- 
## testcase 1
input
```
3
A
BC
DEFG
```
output
```
7
11
```
## testcase 2
input
```
4
K
WL
TZAL
YYWBNRJT
```
output
```
38
83
```
## testcase 3
input
```
8
E
AO
LGIZ
UZXRZLFB
XDNWASDAMPPEKSJT
IYRJQGXNONNPAHMINGDNBVFEVBSQOPLK
IZEPIUDVLAINYCQORHNCBEEZVPZXKVXRUCMHBHEFHAKSXWTAVYMLRJDSDBKXXUML
DGJAITDWMGRTTCLXSTJIASFFCOZAHOPIEEMQYADJSAFZUTRCHWJGROHZERUHPZDKLLBIQMVJHRVPSHLAJKHTUCUNHYQZBZWCCAVTBDEQUZFFUMFURRXELKCRQGKTVUUW
```
output
```
55
134
```
## testcase 4
input
```
10
A
AA
AAAA
AAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA

```
output
